search_context.search_topic: How to get free school meals
search_context.need: I'm recently been made unemployed and I do not have an income, I'd like to apply for free school meals. I'm keen to know what is the criteria and how quickly I will find out if I'm eligible

results.title: Apply for free school meals for your child - Pembrokeshire County ...
results.snippet: Make an application for eFSM if you are eligible, even if your child already receives free school meals with the rollout of UPFSM. You can apply any time.

results.snippet: *You do not qualify if you receive Working Tax Credits and Child Tax Credits - even if your annual household income is still under £16,190p.a.. Application ...

results.title: Take advantage of free school meals to save time and money ...
results.snippet: Jul 17, 2023 ... Take advantage of the free hot or cold school meals available from September. There is always a sandwich or jacket potato option for children each day.

results.title: Get help with School Essentials - Pembrokeshire County Council
results.snippet: If you are the parent or guardian of a child in school and receives means tested free school meals, you may be eligible for a School Essentials Grant.

results.title: Back to school reminder of free school meals for full time Primary ...
results.snippet: Sep 5, 2024 ... As the new school year starts anyone with children in full time Primary are reminded that hot and cold lunches are available every day for free.

results.title: Pembrokeshire County Council - Cost of living
results.snippet: If you have three or more children in school paying for meals, you can receive discounted school meals for each child. Free Breakfast in Primary Schools scheme.
